sections.title: Beneath The Sea
sections.subtitle: Unveiling Ocean Mysteries
sections.description: Add a stunning new dimension to your experience at Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo by entering the larger-than-life aquarium tunnel. Step into the diversity of the open ocean as you walk through this extraordinary 48-metre-long tunnel, 11 metres below the surface. Watch colourful fish dart between coral formations and witness rays glide gracefully overhead.

items.title: Walk Amongst Marine Life
items.description: Feel the magic as you become part of this underwater world, surrounded by a vibrant tapestry of fish and rays.

items.title: Witness the Feeding Frenzy
items.description: Witness a thrilling spectacle as skilled divers engage in feeding sessions with sharks and rays, offering a glimpse into their fascinating feeding behaviours.

items.title: Discover Tranquillity in the Deep
items.description: Immerse yourself in the peaceful ambiance of the tunnel. Escape the everyday as you observe the movements of the underwater world.

items.title: 360-Degree Ocean Views
items.description: Experience the wonder of being completely surrounded by marine life with our unique tunnel design offering panoramic underwater views.

sections.title: Aquatic Encounters
sections.subtitle: Journey Through Diverse Ecosystems
sections.description: Underwater Zoo showcases the spectacular diversity of life in our rivers and oceans through three distinct ecological zones â€“ Rainforest, Rocky Shore and Living Ocean. Watch out for a vast array of aquatic animals across 40 individual displays:

items.title: Rainforest
items.description: Journey through lush vegetation where freshwater fish thrive alongside amphibians and reptiles. Piranhas, giant catfish, playful otters and water rats are just some of the animals you'll meet here.

items.title: Rocky Shore
items.description: Where land meets sea, experience rugged beauty where only the toughest survive. Reach out and touch some of the hardier rock pool inhabitants for a truly immersive experience.

items.title: Living Ocean
items.description: Venture into this underwater world where coral reefs shimmer and graceful sharks patrol the expanse.

items.title: Get Up Close and Personal
items.description: Get nose-to-nose with our incredible inhabitants including playful otters and mischievous penguins!

sections.title: Conservation & Education
sections.subtitle: Making Waves for Wildlife
sections.description: Join us in our mission to protect marine life through education and conservation. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to ensure the well-being of our 140+ species while contributing to global conservation efforts.

items.title: Behind the Scenes Tours
items.description: Go beyond the glass and discover what it takes to maintain one of the world's largest aquarium tanks. Learn about our state-of-the-art filtration systems and meet our passionate marine biologists.

items.title: Educational Programs
items.description: Engage with interactive workshops designed for all ages. From school field trips to specialized marine biology courses, we offer unique learning experiences that inspire the next generation of ocean advocates.

items.title: Rescue & Rehabilitation
items.description: Learn about our efforts to rescue and rehabilitate injured marine animals, preparing them for their return to the wild whenever possible.

items.title: Research Initiatives
items.description: Discover our ongoing research projects focused on marine conservation, breeding programs, and understanding ocean ecosystems to protect them for future generations.

sections.title: Unforgettable Experiences
sections.subtitle: Dive Into Adventure
sections.description: Take your visit to the next level with our exclusive experiences designed to bring you closer to marine life than ever before.

items.title: Shark Diving
items.description: For certified divers, experience the ultimate adrenaline rush swimming alongside our magnificent sharks in complete safety with our experienced dive masters.

items.title: Cage Snorkeling
items.description: Not a certified diver? No problem! Our cage snorkeling experience lets you safely observe sharks and rays up close while floating at the surface.

items.title: Glass Bottom Boat
items.description: Glide across the surface of our main tank in our glass-bottom boat, offering a unique perspective of the underwater world below.

items.title: VR Zoo
items.description: Embark on a virtual reality journey to explore marine habitats from around the globe, coming face-to-face with creatures from the deepest oceans.

sections.title: Plan Your Visit
sections.subtitle: Making Memories That Last
sections.description: Everything you need to know to make the most of your visit to Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo.

items.title: Opening Hours
items.description: Daily 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM (Last entry 9:30 PM). Extended hours during weekends and public holidays. Please check our website for special event timings.

items.title: Combo Packages
items.description: Maximize your experience with our special packages that include Underwater Zoo access, Behind the Scenes tours, and exclusive animal encounters. Save up to 30% when booking multiple experiences.

items.title: Birthday Parties
items.description: Celebrate your special day surrounded by marine wonders with our customized birthday packages including exclusive tours, educational activities, and a dedicated party area with underwater views.

items.title: Annual Passes
items.description: Dive in all year round with our annual membership, offering unlimited visits, exclusive events, special discounts on experiences, and priority booking for new attractions.

facts: Our 10-million litre tank is one of the largest suspended aquariums in the world
We're home to over 33,000 aquatic animals representing more than 140 species
The aquarium panel is 32.88 meters wide, 8.3 meters tall, and 750mm thick
Our King Croc weighs over 750kg and is over 40 years old
